quest.name: The Big Sleep
journal:
Uin Nee does not like to be kept waiting, especially when there is frolicking to be done.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Search for the sleepy pixie near Mithai Glorianda.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Oh dear, dear, dear! At this rate, the children will wake up before we get there!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: It's my friend, you see. We made a promise to go frolicking in Lyhe Mheg, but they're nowhere to be seen! They must've fallen asleep! Can you believe it!?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Hmph! I'd better stay here on the off chance they come looking for me. What I need is someone to go and find them in my stead... And who else would show up just in time but my favorite mortal! Well then, off you go!

dialogue.name: SLEEPINGPIXIE03699
dialogue.text: Not the beavers! Not the beavers! <snore>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Although you have found the sleeping pixie, they show no signs of waking up any time soon.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: You found them! That's terrific! So...where are they?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Hmm... Such a deep sleep can only mean one thing. They'll probably be returning to Glorianda any day now.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: What are you looking at me like that for? Must I explain everything? <sigh> Very well.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: You see, even we pixies don't know where we come from. One day we simply awaken─with a poof, or so I like to think! We're alive! And then eventually we lie down to go to sleep and simply fade away...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Some say we pass into a never-ending dream, where we return to Glorianda, the legendary Forebear of Pixies.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Or maybe that sleepyhead is just being lazy! Anyway, I've got plenty to keep me busy while I wait for them to wake up, like sending silly mortals running here, there, and everywhere to carry out my bidding! Muahahaha!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Pixies who sleep for too long sometimes fade away into their dreams, where they return to Glorianda. That silly so-and-so has been going to Mithai Glorianda rather frequently, so maybe their time has come?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Not that it's any of my concern. I just don't like to be kept waiting! But you'll keep me amused in the meantime, won't you?
